name: CollisionCastQueryType
desc: The kinds of ray and convex shape cast queries that you can make.

items.name: case all
items.desc: Report all hits sorted in ascending order by distance from the cast origin.

items.name: static func == (CollisionCastQueryType, CollisionCastQueryType) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two cast queries are equal.

items.name: static func != (CollisionCastQueryType, CollisionCastQueryType) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two cast queries are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the cast query by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the cast query.
